amendment.description: At the end of the resolution, add the following: SEC. 7. The amendments specified in Rules Committee Print 116-23 shall be considered as though printed in part B of House Report 116-143.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to make in order amendments specified in Rules Committee Print 116-23 and considered as though printed in Part B of House Report 116-143.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 197 (Roll no. 435).

action.text: On ordering the previous question on the amendment (A001) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 232 - 197 (Roll no. 434).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 197 (Roll no. 435).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 197 (Roll no. 435).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. McGovern.
